initiatives.heading: Initiatives
initiatives.sub_heading: Unlock the highest level of organization for all your work in Plane.
initiatives.title: Enable Initiatives
initiatives.description: Set bigger goals to monitor the progress

integrations.title: No integrations configured
integrations.description: Configure GitHub and other integrations to sync your project work items.

general.title: Teamspaces unlock better organization and tracking in Plane.
general.description: Create a dedicated surface for every real-world team, separate from all other work surfaces in Plane, and customize them to suit how your team works.

general.title: Start by linking projects to this teamspace.
general.description: Teamspaces link projects that team members are in, so you can see only their work, their contribution to progress in those projects, and team-specific work metrics.

no_work_items.title: Create team-specific work items.
no_work_items.description: Work items that are assigned to members of this team in any linked project will automatically show up here. If you expect to see some work items here, make sure your linked projects have work items assigned to members of this team or create work items.

primary_button.text: Add work items to a linked project

work_items_empty_filter.title: There are no team-specific work items for the filters applied
work_items_empty_filter.description: Change some of those filters or clear them all to see work items relevant to this space.

current.title: None of your linked projects have an active cycle.
current.description: Active cycles in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see an active cycle, make sure it is running in a linked project right now.

completed.title: None of your linked projects have a completed cycle.
completed.description: Completed cycles in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see a completed cycle, make sure it is also completed in a linked project.

upcoming.title: None of your linked projects have an upcoming cycle.
upcoming.description: Upcoming cycles in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see an upcoming cycle, make sure it is there in a linked project, too.

team_view.title: Your team's views of your work without disrupting any other views in your workspace
team_view.description: See your team's work in views that are saved just for your team and separately from a project's views.

project_view.title: None of your linked projects have any public views.
project_view.description: Public views in linked projects will automatically show up here. To see public views from linked projects here, make sure those projects have public views accessible to all project members.

filter.title: No matching views
filter.description:
No views match the search criteria. 
 Create a new view instead.

team_page.title: House your team's knowledge in Team Pages.
team_page.description: Unlike pages in a project, you can save knowledge specific to a team in a separate set of pages here. Get all the features of Pages, create best practices docs, and team wikis easily.

project_page.title: None of your linked projects have public pages.
project_page.description: Public pages in linked projects will automatically show up here. If you expect to see public pages here, make sure your linked projects have public pages available to all project members.

filter.title: No matching pages
filter.description: Remove the filters to see all pages

search.title: No matching pages
search.description: Remove the search criteria to see all pages

progress.title: None of your linked projects have published work items.
progress.description: Create some work items in one or more of those projects to see progress by dates, states, and priority.

blocking.title: You don't have any work items blocking a teammate.
blocking.description: Good job! You have cleared the path for your team. You are a good team player.

blocked.title: You don't have any teammate's work items blocking you.
blocked.description: Good news! You can make progress on all your assigned work items.

general.title: None of your linked projects have published work items.
general.description: Create some work items in one or more of those projects to see distribution of work by project and team members.

filter.title: There are no team stats for the filters applied.
filter.description: Create some work items in one or more of those projects to see distribution of work by project and team members.

initiatives.label: Initiatives
initiatives.fill_all_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields.

toast.create_error: Failed to create initiative. Please try again!
toast.update_error: Failed to update initiative. Please try again!
toast.project_update_error: Failed to update initiative projects. Please try again!
toast.epic_update_success: Epic{count, plural, one { added to Initiative successfully.} other {s added to Initiative successfully.}}
toast.epic_update_error: Epic addition to Initiative failed. Please try again later.

general.title: Organize work at the highest level with Initiatives
general.description: When you need to organize work spanning several projects and teams, Initiatives come in handy. Connect projects and epics to initiatives, see automatically rolled up updates, and see the forests before you get to the trees.

search.title: No matching initiatives
search.description:
No initiatives detected with the matching criteria. 
 Create a new initiative instead.

not_found.title: Initiative does not exist
not_found.description: The Initiative you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

general.title: Write a note, a doc, or a full knowledge base. Get Galileo, Plane's AI assistant, to help you get started
general.description: Pages are thoughts potting space in Plane. Take down meeting notes, format them easily, embed work items, lay them out using a library of components, and keep them all in your project's context. To make short work of any doc, invoke Galileo, Plane's AI, with a shortcut or the click of a button.

private.title: No private pages yet
private.description: Keep your private thoughts here. When you're ready to share, the team's just a click away.

public.title: No public pages yet
public.description: See pages shared with everyone in your workspace right here.

archived.title: No archived pages yet
archived.description: Archive pages not on your radar. Access them here when needed.

general.title: Create an epic and assign it to someone, even yourself
general.description: For larger bodies of work that span several cycles and can live across modules, create an epic. Link work items and sub-work items in a project to an epic and jump into a work item from the overview.

section.title: No epics yet
section.description: Start adding epics to manage and track the progress.

active.title: No active cycles
active.description: Cycles of your projects that includes any period that encompasses today's date within its range. Find the progress and details of all your active cycle here.

progress.title:
Add work items to the cycle to view it's 
 progress

priority.title:
Observe high priority work items tackled in 
 the cycle at a glance.

assignee.title:
Add assignees to work items to see a 
 breakdown of work by assignees.

label.title:
Add labels to work items to see the 
 breakdown of work by labels.

cancel_trial.title: Cancel your trial first.
cancel_trial.description: You have an active trial to one of our paid plans. Please cancel it first to proceed.
cancel_trial.cancel_success_message: You can now delete the workspace.

invalid_archive_state_group.title: Unable to archive work items
invalid_archive_state_group.message: Only work items belonging to Completed or Canceled state groups can be archived.

invalid_issue_start_date.title: Unable to update work items
invalid_issue_start_date.message: Start date selected succeeds the due date for some work items. Ensure start date to be before the due date.

invalid_issue_target_date.title: Unable to update work items
invalid_issue_target_date.message: Due date selected precedes the start date for some work items. Ensure due date to be after the start date.

properties.title: Custom properties
properties.tooltip: Each work item type comes with a default set of properties like Title, Description, Assignee, State, Priority, Start date, Due date, Module, Cycle etc. You can also customize and add your own properties to tailor it to your team's needs.

name.integrity: Option with same name already exists.

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to create property. Please try again!

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to update property. Please try again!

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to delete property. Please try again!

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to {action} property. Please try again!

name.max_length: Property name should not exceed 255 characters.

property_type.required: You must select a property type.

options.required: You must add at least one option.

delete_confirmation.title: Delete this property
delete_confirmation.description: Deletion of properties may lead to loss of existing data.
delete_confirmation.secondary_description: Do you want to disable the property instead?

mandate_confirmation.label: Mandatory property
mandate_confirmation.content: There seems to be a default option for this property. Making the property mandatory will remove the default value and the users will have to add a value of their choice.

tooltip.disabled: This property type cannot be made mandatory
tooltip.enabled: Uncheck to mark the field as optional
tooltip.checked: Check to mark the field as mandatory

empty_state.title: Add custom properties
empty_state.description: New properties you add for this work item type will show here.

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to create work item type. Please try again!

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to update work item type. Please try again!

name.placeholder: Give this work item type a unique name

description.placeholder: Describe what this work item type is meant for and when it's to be used.

error.title: Error!
error.message: Failed to {action} work item type. Please try again!

enable.title: Enable Work item types
enable.description: Shape work items to your work with Work item types. Customize with icons, backgrounds, and properties and configure them for this project.

confirmation.title: Once enabled, Work item types can't be disabled.
confirmation.description: Plane's Work item will become the default work item type for this project and will show up with its icon and background in this project.

get_pro.title: Get Pro to enable Work item types.
get_pro.description: Shape work items to your work with Work item types. Customize with icons, backgrounds, and properties and configure them for this project.

upgrade.title: Upgrade to enable Work item types.
upgrade.description: Shape work items to your work with Work item types. Customize with icons, backgrounds, and properties and configure them for this project.

importers.import_message: Import your {serviceName} data into plane projects.
importers.no_project_imports: You haven't imported any {serviceName} projects yet.
importers.cancel_import_job_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this import job? This will stop the import process for this project.
importers.re_run_import_job_confirmation: Are you sure you want to re-run this import job? This will restart the import process for this project.
importers.upload_csv_file: Upload a CSV file to import user data.
importers.migration_assistant_description: Seamlessly migrate your {serviceName} projects to Plane with our powerful assistant.
importers.token_helper: You will get this from your
importers.source_token_expired_description: The provided token has expired. Please deactivate and reconnect with new set of credentials.
importers.add_seat_msg_free_trial: You're trying to import {additionalUserCount} non-registered users and you've only {currentWorkspaceSubscriptionAvailableSeats} seats available in current plan. To continue importing upgrade now.
importers.add_seat_msg_paid: You're trying to import {additionalUserCount} non-registered users and you've only {currentWorkspaceSubscriptionAvailableSeats} seats available in current plan. To continue importing buy atleast {extraSeatRequired} extra seats.
importers.skip_user_import_description: Skipping user import will result in work items, comments, and other data from {serviceName} being created by the user performing the migration in Plane. You can still manually add users later.

jira_importer.jira_importer_description: Import your Jira data into Plane projects.
jira_importer.email_description: This is the email linked to your personal access token
jira_importer.jira_domain_description: This is the domain of your Jira instance

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Jira data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_jira: Please select the Jira workspace from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_import_users: Please add the users you wish to migrate from Jira to Plane. Alternatively, you can skip this step and manually add users later.
steps.description_map_states: We have automatically matched the Jira statuses to Plane states to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining states before proceeding, you can also create states and map them manually.
steps.description_map_priorities: We have automatically matched the priorities to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining priorities before proceeding.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from Jira to Plane.

asana_importer.asana_importer_description: Import your Asana data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Asana data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_asana: Please select the Asana workspace and project from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_map_states: Please select the Asana states which you want to map to Plane project statuses.
steps.description_map_priorities: Please select the Asana priorities which you want to map to Plane project priorities.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from Asana to Plane.

linear_importer.linear_importer_description: Import your Linear data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Linear data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_linear: Please select the Linear team from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_map_states: We have automatically matched the Linear statuses to Plane states to the best of our ability. Please map any remaining states before proceeding, you can also create states and map them manually.
steps.description_map_priorities: Please select the Linear priorities which you want to map to Plane project priorities.
steps.description_summary: Here is a summary of the data that will be migrated from Linear to Plane.

jira_server_importer.jira_server_importer_description: Import your Jira Server data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your Jira data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_jira: Please select the Jira workspace from which you want to migrate your data.
steps.description_map_states: Please select the Jira states which you want to map to Plane project statuses.
steps.description_map_priorities: Please select the Jira priorities which you want to map to Plane project priorities.

flatfile_importer.flatfile_importer_description: Import your CSV data into Plane projects.

steps.description_configure_plane: Please first create the project in Plane where you intend to migrate your CSV data. Once the project is created, select it here.
steps.description_configure_csv: Please upload your CSV file and configure the fields to be mapped to Plane fields.
